com.rafaelbattesti.jungle

Class SwimmingPiece

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.piece.Piece
      • com.rafaelbattesti.jungle.SwimmingPiece
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    WeakestPiece

    public class SwimmingPiece
extends logic.piece.Piece
    This Class intends to define the methods to instantiate a Swimming piece.
    A SwimmingPiece cannot take any opponent's Piece when leaving the WaterTile.
    A SwimmingPiece can take another SwimmingPiece while both are on WaterTile.
    Please refer to subclass WeakestPiece for details about the Rat taking the Elephant.
    Since:
    2015-04-19
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Rafael Battesti for Jungle Project 2015 - PROG10082 - Java 1
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
